solution_line_template: After painting the red and blue pebbles, Shawn had a remainder of {total_pebbles} - {red_pebbles} - {blue_pebbles} = <<{total_pebbles}-{red_pebbles}-{blue_pebbles}={remaining_pebbles}>>{remaining_pebbles} pebbles.
The difference between the number of blue and yellow pebbles is {blue_pebbles} - {yellow_pebbles} = <<{blue_pebbles}-{yellow_pebbles}={difference}>>{difference}.
